providers.modal_heading_deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this provider's account?
providers.modal_text_deactivate:
The provider will no longer be able to adjust their availability, enroll into campaigns, suggest consultations to clients or appear into client searches.

Note: The provider will still be able to access their account, view their past consultations, and conduct already scheduled consultations.
providers.modal_heading_activate: Are you sure you want to activate this provider's account?
providers.modal_text_activate: The provider will be able to adjust their availability, enroll into campaigns, suggest consultations to clients and appear into client searches.
providers.name: Name

edit-provider.consultation_price_error: Consultation price must be a non-negative number
edit-provider.consultation_price_disabled: Paid consultations are not available in your country

security-check.heading: Consultation issue reports
security-check.question_1: Did the provider attend the consultation session?
security-check.question_2: Did the provider ask you to disclose your address and contact details?
security-check.question_3: Did the provider ask you to meet them outside of the system
security-check.question_4: Did the provider ask you to send them any photos of yourself or turn on your video even if you did not want to?
security-check.question_5: Did you feel unsafe in any way during the session?
security-check.question_6: Explanation about feeling unsafe during the consultation.
security-check.question_7: How are you feeling about the last consultation session?
security-check.question_8: Have your needs been addressed properly? 1-10 (No, not at all – Yes, all of them)
security-check.question_9: Do you understand how you can improve your wellbeing? 1-10 (No, not at all – Yes, all is clear)
security-check.question_10: Compare your current feeling to how you felt before the session started. How is it? 1-10 (No, it’s much worse – Can’t be better)
security-check.no_results: There are no security check reports found

analytics.engagement_score_tooltip: The engagement score is a weighted score based on an algorithm that takes into account the downloads, shares, likes and views of the articles, videos and podcasts in the category.
analytics.globalWebsiteVisits_info: Total visits the the global ("usupport.online") website
analytics.cancelledConsultations_info: Consultations which were cancelled before being conducted
analytics.lateCancelledConsultations_info: Consultations which were cancelled less than 24 hours before the consultation start time
analytics.totalConsultations_info: Total scheduled consultations on the platform. This metric includes canceled and late-canceled consultations
analytics.mobileScheduledConsultations_info: Consultation scheduled on the mobile app. This metric does NOT include canceled or late-canceled consultations
analytics.scheduledConsultations_info: Consultation scheduled on the web portal. This metric does NOT include canceled or late-canceled consultations
analytics.scheduleButtonClick_info: Clicks of the "Schedule consultation" button on the web portal
analytics.mobileScheduleButtonClick_info: Clicks of the "Schedule consultation" button on the mobile app
analytics.totalProviders_info: Total registered providers on the platform
analytics.activeProviders_info: Providers logged in the last 15 days
analytics.allClients_info: Total registered clients on the platform
analytics.activeClients_info: Clients logged in the last 15 days
analytics.totalWebsiteAccess_info: Total visits to the current country website
analytics.uniqueWebsiteAccess_info: Unique visitors to the current country website
analytics.totalClientAccess_info: Total visits to the client portal
analytics.uniqueClientAccess_info: Unique visitors to the client portal
analytics.totalProviderAccess_info: Total visits to the provider portal
analytics.uniqueProviderAccess_info: Unique visitors to the provider portal
analytics.totalMobileAccess_info: Total visits to the mobile app
analytics.uniqueMobileAccess_info: Unique visitors to the mobile app
analytics.emailRegisterClick_info: Total clicks on the "Register with email" button on the web portal
analytics.mobileEmailRegisterClick_info: Total clicks on the "Register with email" button on the mobile app
analytics.anonymousRegisterClick_info: Total clicks on the "Register anonymously" button on the web portal
analytics.mobileAnonymousRegisterClick_info: Total clicks on the "Register anonymously" button on the mobile app
analytics.guestRegisterClick_info: Total clicks on the "Guest register" button on the web portal
analytics.mobileGuestRegisterClick_info: Total clicks on the "Guest register" button on the mobile app
analytics.joinConsultationClick_info: Total clicks on the "Join consultation" button on the web portal
analytics.mobileJoinConsultationClick_info: Total clicks on the "Join consultation" button on the mobile app
analytics.positiveClientRatings_info: Total positive ratings given by clients
analytics.positiveProviderRatings_info: Total positive ratings given by providers
analytics.data_cannot_be_filtered: This data is not filtered by demographics. It is generated based on anonymous data

baseline-assessment-thresholds.title: Baseline Assessment Thresholds
baseline-assessment-thresholds.description: Manage threshold values for baseline assessment factors. Edit the below and above values to adjust risk level boundaries.

providers-free-slots.heading: Generate Provider Free Slots Report
providers-free-slots.description: Generate a report that includes all consultations whose start time falls between the selected start date and end date. The report will include numerical data and be generated in CSV format.
providers-free-slots.end_date_before_start_error: End date must be after start date
providers-free-slots.end_time_before_start_error: End time must be after start time
